photoURL.description: URL for the user's profile picture.

exam.description: The exam the user is preparing for.

onboardingCompleted.description: Flag indicating if the user has completed onboarding.

role.description: The user's role in the application.

isBanned.description: Flag indicating if the user is banned.

isDeleted.description: Flag indicating if the user is soft-deleted.

banExpiresAt.description: The timestamp when the user's ban expires.

hasPendingUnbanRequest.description: Flag indicating if the user has a pending unban request.

darkMode.description: Flag indicating if the user prefers dark mode.

currentStreak.description: The user's current daily goal completion streak.

longestStreak.description: The user's longest ever daily goal completion streak.

lastGoalCompletedDate.description: The date the last daily goal was completed (YYYY-MM-DD).

totalPoints.description: The user's total accumulated points from completing goals.

isPremium.description: Flag indicating if the user has a premium membership.

accessCode.description: A unique code for a demo user to show an admin for manual account activation.

accountStatus.description: The current status of the user's account.

loginCode.description: A 4-digit PIN for quick app access.

Mistake.title: Mistake Notebook Entry
Mistake.description: Represents a single mistake logged by a user in their mistake notebook.

userId.description: The UID of the user who logged the mistake.

subject.description: The subject related to the mistake (e.g., 'physics').

chapter.description: The chapter related to the mistake.

question.description: The question, topic, or context of the mistake.

myMistake.description: User's description of what they did wrong.

correctConcept.description: User's description of the correct concept or solution.

tags.description: User-defined tags for categorizing the mistake.

status.description: The status of the mistake entry.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the mistake was logged.

ChapterProgress.title: Chapter Progress
ChapterProgress.description: Stores a user's progress for a single chapter.

completed.description: Whether the chapter is marked as completed.

revisions.description: An array of timestamps (numbers) for each revision.

UserProgress.title: User Progress
UserProgress.description: Stores a user's progress and revision history.

progress.description: An object where keys are subjects and values are objects of chapter progress.

revisions.description: Stores revision history for each subject. Keys are subject names.

questions.description: Number of questions solved during revision.

Quote.title: Quote
Quote.description: A motivational quote saved by the user.

isAiGenerated.description: Flag indicating if the quote was generated by AI.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the quote was created.

Syllabus.title: Syllabus
Syllabus.description: Stores the syllabus for an exam subject.

exam.description: The exam this syllabus belongs to.

chapters.description: An ordered list of chapter names for the subject.

UnbanRequest.title: Unban Request
UnbanRequest.description: A request from a banned user to be unbanned.

userId.description: The UID of the user making the request.

userName.description: The display name of the user.

reason.description: The reason provided by the user for the unban request.

status.description: The current status of the request.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the request was created.

Group.title: Group
Group.description: Represents a user-created group for collaboration.

description.description: A short description of the group's purpose.

photoURL.description: URL for the group's profile picture.

adminId.description: The UID of the user who is the admin of the group.

memberIds.description: Array of user UIDs who are members of the group.

lastMessage.description: The text of the last message sent in the group.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the group was created.

GroupMessage.title: Group Chat Message
GroupMessage.description: Represents a single message within a group chat.

senderId.description: The UID of the message sender.

senderName.description: The display name of the sender.

senderPhotoURL.description: The photo URL of the sender.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the message was sent.

DailyGoal.title: Daily Goal
DailyGoal.description: A user's collection of study goals for a single day.

userId.description: The UID of the user this goal belongs to.

date.description: The date for which this goal is set.

goals.description: A list of individual goals for the day.

text.description: The text content for a custom goal.

completed.description: Whether all goals for the day have been completed.

Post.title: A-gram Post
Post.description: Represents a user-created post in A-gram.

userId.description: The UID of the user who created the post.

userDisplayName.description: The display name of the user who created the post.

userPhotoURL.description: The profile picture URL of the user who created the post.

imageUrl.description: The URL of the image for the post.

likes.description: An array of user UIDs who have liked the post.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

Comment.title: A-gram Comment
Comment.description: Represents a comment on a post.

userId.description: The UID of the user who made the comment.

userDisplayName.description: The display name of the user.

userPhotoURL.description: The photo URL of the sender.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the comment was made.

Follow.title: Follow Relationship
Follow.description: Represents a follow relationship between two users.

followerId.description: The UID of the user who is following.

followedId.description: The UID of the user who is being followed.

ContactSubmission.title: Contact Form Submission
ContactSubmission.description: Stores a submission from the contact form.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the submission was created.

isRead.description: Flag indicating if an admin has read the submission.

PremiumCode.title: Premium Activation Code
PremiumCode.description: A one-time code generated by an admin to grant premium access.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the code was created.

createdBy.description: The UID of the admin who created the code.

/users/{userId}.description: User profile documents, where each document ID is the user's UID.

/users/{userId}/quotes/{quoteId}.description: A collection of motivational quotes saved by a user.

/users/{userId}/dailyGoals/{goalId}.description: A user's daily study goals, where the document ID is the date string 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

/users/{userId}/mistakes/{mistakeId}.description: A user's personal collection of logged mistakes.

/userProgress/{userId}.description: Documents storing syllabus progress for each user, where the document ID is the user's UID.

/syllabuses/{syllabusId}.description: Collection of syllabus documents for each subject and exam.

/unbanRequests/{requestId}.description: Collection of unban requests from banned users.

/contactSubmissions/{submissionId}.description: Collection of messages submitted through the contact form.

/groups/{groupId}/messages/{messageId}.description: A subcollection of messages within a group.

/posts/{postId}.description: Collection of all posts for A-gram.

/posts/{postId}/comments/{commentId}.description: Subcollection of comments on a specific post.

/follows/{followId}.description: Stores all follow relationships. Each document represents one user following another.

/premiumCodes/{codeId}.description: Collection of one-time premium activation codes generated by admins. The document ID is the code string.
